keyword: how many calories are in granny smith apples
title: How Many Calories in Granny Smith Apples?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in granny smith apples per medium fruit, plus carbs, fiber, protein, and nutrition tweaks for better tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Granny Smith Apples?
assumptions: Raw, with skin, medium size (~182 g); values similar to general apples as Granny Smith specifics align closely.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, and variety; organic vs. conventional may differ slightly. Check produce labels or apps for precision.

quick_answer.text: One medium Granny Smith apple has about 95 kcal and 4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Granny Smith apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for a medium raw apple with skin.

faqs.q: Are Granny Smith apples low in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, around 52 kcal per 100 g, making them a low-calorie snack.

faqs.q: How much fiber in Granny Smith apples?
faqs.a: One medium apple provides ~4.4 g dietary fiber, mostly soluble.

faqs.q: Do Granny Smith apples have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.5 g protein and 0.3 g fat per medium apple.

faqs.q: How does apple size affect calories in Granny Smith apples?
faqs.a: Smaller apples (~130 g) have ~68 kcal; larger (~223 g) around 116 kcal.
